title: Trump scores first big trade deal. What's next? Here's what to expect.
shortDescription: Trump paused reciprocal tariffs for 90 days on April 9, saying countries were eager to negotiate deals. The first emerged a month later with the UK.

title: Landmark cryptocurrency bill blocked over concerns about Trump
shortDescription: The cryptocurrency industry has aggressively lobbied for the legislation.

title: As Cardinal, Pope Leo XIV was critical of Trump, Vance on social media
shortDescription: Three recent X posts from then-Cardinal Robert Francis Prevost of Chicago - now Pope Leo XIV - shared items critical of Trump and Vance policies.

title: FEMA administrator replaced after opposing Trump's view of agency
shortDescription: Pressed during a May 7 committee hearing about abolishing FEMA, acting administrator Cameron Hamilton said he opposes it. He was ousted the next day.

title: Trump selects influencer Doctor Casey Means as Surgeon General
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump has selected health entrepreneur and wellness influencer Dr. Casey Means as the US Surgeon General.

title: President Trump announces UK trade deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced a trade deal with the U.K., the first trade agreement since he imposed sweeping tariffs in April.

title: Trump seeks to revoke safe-haven program for Haitian, Venezuelan immigrants
shortDescription: The administration wants to cut short a program that provided a haven from economic, security, political and health crises in their home countries.

title: Trump says there are 2 new holidays: Do you get those days off?
shortDescription: The president this week announced "Victory" days for November 11 and May 8, but noted "we will not be closing the Country" on the holidays.

title: Trump says James Bond's Aston Martins have 'nothing to worry about'
shortDescription: Trump's tariffs left worldwide trade shaken and stirred but he said a United Kingdom trade deal means James Bond's cars 'nothing to worry about'

title: Melania Trump to make rare appearance to unveil Barbara Bush stamp
shortDescription: First Lady Melania Trump is to appear at the White House May 8 for a rare public appearance honoring former First Lady Barbara Bush.

title: Trump sought to help 'super luxury' UK automakers in new trade deal
shortDescription: President Trump said he made a special exception by lowering tariffs on UK vehicles to help high-end automakers Rolls-Royce, Bentley and Jaguar.

title: Trump pulls DC attorney pick Ed Martin amid Republican opposition
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he'll tap someone else for DC attorney amid Republican opposition to Ed Martin over his support for Jan. 6 rioters.

title: See Trump announce trade deal with UK in Oval Office
shortDescription: President Donald Trump made an announcement about a UK trade deal in the Oval Office of the White House in Washington, DC, on May 8, 2025.

title: Biden takes responsibility for Trump's win on 'The View'
shortDescription: The Democratic warhorse rejected criticism that his age and acuity was a factor in the final months of his single term in the White House

title: Lives at risk under Trump health care cuts, medical experts say
shortDescription: Proposed cuts threaten health insurance for tens of millions, tariffs will drive up drug prices, and key programs are being cut, medical experts say.

title: House passes bill to rename Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America
shortDescription: The Republican-controlled House passed a bill that would solidify President Donald Trump’s move to rename the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America.

title: Georgia Senate race intensifies as challenger to Ossoff emerges
shortDescription: The Georgia Senate race will be one of the most competitive in the 2026 election cycle as a challenger emerges for Democrat Jon Ossoff.

title: Trump proclaims 'America's victory' around VE Day
shortDescription: President Donald Trump proclaimed May 8th as Victory Day to celebrate "America's victory."

title: Who is Casey Means? Trump's new surgeon general nominee sparks drama
shortDescription: Trump changed his surgeon general pick, setting aside a nominee who backed COVID masking and social distancing . What to know about his new pick, Casey Means.

title: Trump slams Federal Reserve chair after interest rate decision
shortDescription: The Fed has left it's key interest rate unchanged for three consecutive meetings, with Chair Jerome Powell citing economic uncertainty.

title: Trump announces trade deal with UK
shortDescription: Final details are under wraps but Trump promised the deal provides billions of dollars in access for U.S. agricultural products like beef and ethanol.

title: Trump is pressuring colleges. Does that help China?
shortDescription: The White House has cut off billions in federal funding from major American research universities as the United States and China compete to innovate.

title: Marco’s moment: Rubio in the hot seat amid Trump team shakeup
shortDescription: Secretary of State Marco Rubio's new job as national security adviser sets the former Donald Trump rival up for a bigger role in war and peace.

title: Trump teases 'major trade deal' announcement amid tariff fight
shortDescription: Trump wrote on social media there will be a 'Big News Conference' May 8 'concerning a MAJOR TRADE DEAL.'

title: Called out by Trump, Supreme Court's John Roberts says he likes a low profile
shortDescription: While vacationing in Portugal, Chief Justice John Roberts was mistaken for John Boehner, the former House GOP Speaker. He is fine with that.

title: Trump changes his mind on pick for surgeon general
shortDescription: Trump announced that Dr. Casey Means is his new pick to serve as U.S. surgeon general after withdrawing the nomination of Dr. Janette Nesheiwat.
